sentences: The SBI took up this agenda item on 29 November.

The topic included three sub-items dealing with budget performance for the biennium 2010-2011 (FCCC/SBI/2011/16 and FCCC/SBI/2011/INF.14); continuing review of the functions and operations of the Secretariat (FCCC/SBI/2011/16 and FCCC/SBI/2011/INF.15); and implementation of the Headquarters Agreement.

On the 2010-2011 budget, UNFCCC Executive Secretary Figueres noted that the majority of mandates and activities in the work programme for 2010-2011 had been completed but any additional activities would require further financial support.
On the review of the Secretariat s functions, she highlighted planned efficiency gains for the biennium 2012-2013.
The SBI adopted conclusions on these issues on 3 December, and the COP and CMP each adopted the following decision on 9 December.
